about_the_game:
Description:
Step into the brutal and immersive world of [Game Title], where survival is earned through grit, cunning, and skill. Set in the depths of an illegal underground fighting pit within a dark fantasy realm reminiscent of the late 1600s, this action-packed RPG challenges you to navigate a society teetering on the edge of collapse.

Forge your path as a fighter—slave or mercenary—and rise through the ranks of a system designed to crush the weak. Hone your combat skills, master deadly weapons, and outwit your opponents in visceral battles against humans and captured magical creatures. In this gritty, unforgiving world, every choice matters. Ally with rival gangs, barter in the shadowy underbelly, and uncover the secrets that could shift the balance of power forever.

Key Features:

  • Brutal Combat: Master deep, skill-based melee mechanics with realistic weapon handling and strategic encounters.

  • Rich Storytelling: Experience a gripping narrative exploring themes of survival, morality, and rebellion in a decaying world.

  • Dynamic NPC Interactions: Interact with lifelike characters powered by advanced AI, each with their own motivations and consequences for your actions.

  • Deep Customization: Shape your playstyle with a wide range of skills, gear, and upgrades tailored to your preferences.

  • Dark Fantasy Setting: Explore a richly detailed, small but intricate world, brought to life with stunning visuals and environmental storytelling.

  • High-Stakes Choices: Make impactful decisions that shape the course of your journey and the fate of those around you.

Prepare to enter the pits and fight for your life—or your freedom. Will you rise as a legend, or be forgotten in the shadows of the arena?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon 5700 XT / INTEL Arc A750
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Faereld is a dark & gritty survival action-RPG. Fight as a slave in an illegal underground fighting pit. Hone your combat skills, ally with rival gangs, recruit fighters, barter in the shadowy underbelly, and uncover the secrets that help you escape this hell-hole where every choice matters.
